sections.text: No liquid mercury thermometer containing elemental mercury shall be sold, given away, or otherwise distributed in this state.SourceLaws 2003, LB 17, ยง 4.

28-1350.Liquid mercury thermometer; prohibited acts.

No liquid mercury thermometer containing elemental mercury shall be sold, given away, or otherwise distributed in this state.

SourceLaws 2003, LB 17, ยง 4.
